concept.title: Multiple Directories and File Sets
concept.shortdesc: File Tail can read related sets of files in multiple directories. When File Tail processes files in multiple directories, it merges all data in the pipeline.

conbody.p: File Tail originmultiple directories and file setsWhen you define a directory, you specify the full path to the active file. For example: /webserver/log/log.txt.

You can define multiple directories by creating a set of configuration properties for each set of files. You can also use wildcards to define glob patterns that represent multiple directories. For example, the following directory can represent sets of activity logs generated by different servers:/*/log/activity.log
